1: <pb/>Max yalon Jehová bay cham Moisés c'al bay cham Aarón,
2: tol a yet ok watx'nen aj eb israel is campamento bay junok lugar, najattak wal ayil eb yinlak mantiado bay chi chalej ba eb yetok; junjunc'al ok ayjok ec' yalan is bandera, c'al yin junjun makquiltakil.
3: <pb/>A bay yetc'ulal bay chi ajol c'u, a tu' ok ayjok is campamento oxeb tribu inej oc bandera yet Judá. A eb soldado yet tribual Judá tu', a ton Naasón, is c'ajol Aminadab, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
4: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 74,600 eb soldado.
5: A yetok eb tu', a tu' ay c'apax ec' is campamento is tribual Isacar. A Natanael, is c'ajol Zuar, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
6: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 54,400 eb soldado.
7: A tu' ay c'apax is campamento is tribual Zabulón yetok eb. A Eliab, is c'ajol Helón, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
8: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 57,400 eb soldado.
9: Yuj tu' xan a bay is campamento Judá ay 186,400 eb soldado. A ton eb babel toj satak conob Israel.
10: <pb/>Axa bay sur, a tu' ay is campamento oxeb tribu inej oc is bandera Rubén. A Elisur, is c'ajol Sedeur, a' ayoc yajawilalok eb soldado yin is tribual Rubén.
11: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 46,500 eb soldado.
12: Junej ay c'apax is campamento is tribual Simeón yetok eb. A Selumiel is c'ajol Zurisadai, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
13: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 59,300 eb soldado.
14: A tu' ay c'apax is campamento is tribual Gad yetok eb. A Eliasaf, is c'ajol Reuel, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
15: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 45,650 eb soldado.
16: Yuj tu' xan a is campamento Rubén, ay 151,450 eb soldado. A ton eb chi bey yin yet is cab makan.
17: <pb/>Cax chi toj c'apax eb levita nan xol caneb campamento. A eb, inej oc mantiadoal bay chi co chalej co ba yetok Jehová. A caneb campamento tu', yin txolilal chi yun beyi, atac'ala' yayji ec' eb bay is campamento, junjunc'al yintak is bandera.
18: <pb/>Axa bay yetc'ulal bay chi toj c'u, a tu' ay is campamento oxeb tribu inej oc is bandera Efraín. A eb soldado yin is tribual Efraín, a Elisama, is c'ajol Amiud, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
19: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 40,500 eb soldado.
20: Junej ay c'apax is tribual Manasés yetok eb. A Gamaliel is c'ajol Pedasur, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
21: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 32,200 eb soldado.
22: A tu' ay c'apax is campamento is tribual Benjamín yetok eb. A Abidán, is c'ajol Gedeoni, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
23: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 35,400 eb soldado.
24: Yuj tu' xan a is campamento Efraín, ay 108,100 soldado. A ton eb chi beytoj yin yet is yox makan.
25: <pb/>Axa bay norte, a tu' ay is campamento oxeb tribu, inej oc is bandera yet is tribual Dan. A eb soldado is tribual Dan tu', a Ahiezer, is c'ajol Amisadai, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
26: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 62,700 eb soldado.
27: Junej ay c'apax is campamento is tribual Aser yetok eb. A Pagiel, is c'ajol Ocrán, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
28: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 41,500 eb soldado.
29: Junej ay c'apax is campamento is tribual Neftalí yetok eb. A Ahira, is c'ajol Enán, a' ayoc is yajawilalok eb.
30: Atac'ala' yalon bisil, tol ay 53,400 eb soldado.
31: Yuj tu' xan a is campamento Dan, ay 157,600 eb soldado. A ton eb chi beytoj yintak bandera Dan tu', a ton eb lajub tzakanxac'al toji, ẍi Cham.
32: <pb/>A is bisil eb israel, max eloc yin 603,550 eb soldado yin masanil.
33: Palta axca wal max yun yalon Jehová bay cham Moisés, maj oc eb levita is tz'akilok.
34: <pb/>Max yun eb israel axca wal max yun yalon Jehová bay cham Moisés; junejc'al max ayji ec' eb yintak is bandera, cax max beyc'altok eb yin txolilal, atac'ala' is makquiltakil.
